Uses of Interface
com.att.research.xacml.api.pap.PDPGroup

  • Packages that use PDPGroup 
    Package Description
    com.att.research.xacml.api.pap
    The PAP interface's defined here are an attempt at defining an API for PAP implementations.
    com.att.research.xacml.std.pap
    contains the standard implementation of the PAP interface
